COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xbe
STRING: For some reason my body was trembling.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xca
STRING: I was supposed to wait here for Tortinita, but I had a
strong urge to go outside.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe0
STRING: For no reason at all, the only thoughts that came to my
mind were unpleasant ones.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf6
STRING: I kept thinking... That she may have been involved in an
accident.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x10c
STRING: There was no way to end up in an accident when going
between my place and Torta's, unless you followed a
main road.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x122
STRING: The other streets were all too narrow for cars to pass
through.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x12e
STRING: But... That was the very reason that people let their
guards down.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x13a
STRING: [Chris] “Torta...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x150
STRING: I really didn't understand why I felt like this.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x15c
STRING: Why did I feel so afraid?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x168
STRING: Why did only those kind of thoughts enter my mind?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x174
STRING: Logically, I knew it was ridiculous.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x180
STRING: But even so, I couldn't stop my body from shaking.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1b6
STRING: [Chris] “Torta?!”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1cc
STRING: I practically screamed, and Torta looked at me in
surprise.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x206
STRING: [Torta] “Uh... C-Chris... What's wrong?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x21c
STRING: [Chris] “I'm the one who should be asking that! I was so
worried because you were late.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x244
STRING: I felt the tension leave my body due to the relief I felt.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x250
STRING: The tension in the air also softened in an instant.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x25c
STRING: But, I was still unable to stop my body from trembling.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x284
STRING: [Torta] “I'm sorry... I just wasn't sure if I...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x29a
STRING: [Chris] “No... As long as you're safe, it's okay. I started
to feel really scared when I thought you might have
been in an accident.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2ba
STRING: My legs started to shake, and I became unable to stand
properly, so I leaned against the wall.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2d0
STRING: [Chris] “What the... I guess my legs must have gone
weak, now that I feel relieved.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x30c
STRING: [Torta] “Chris!”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x336
STRING: Torta dashed over to me and took my hand.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x342
STRING: Borrowing Torta's hand, I moved over to a chair and
slumped into it.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x356
STRING: [Torta] “Chris...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x36c
STRING: [Chris] “I wonder what this is...? I feel so strange.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x382
STRING: Torta was here... Right in front of me, but for some
reason I still felt on edge.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3b4
STRING: [Torta] “Relax. I'm right here... It's okay, Chris.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3ca
STRING: [Chris] “Y-Yeah... You're right.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3fc
STRING: [Torta] “I'll make us something warm to drink.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x412
STRING: [Chris] “No, I'll do it.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x428
STRING: Torta stopped me before I could even stand up.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x450
STRING: [Torta] “No way. You stay right there.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x466
STRING: [Chris] “...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x47c
STRING: Her voice was especially strict.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x488
STRING: I guess that was an indication of how strange my
behavior had seemed.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x49e
STRING: [Chris] “I wonder if I've caught a cold.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4d0
STRING: [Torta] “I doubt that's the case...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4e6
STRING: [Chris] “Really? I hope so.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4fc
STRING: Staying seated, it took a while for me to regain my
composure.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x54c
STRING: I could smell the pleasant aroma of coffee beans.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x558
STRING: Torta came back from the kitchen with two steamy
cups of coffee.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x56e
STRING: She placed them on the table and sat across from me.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x57a
STRING: I felt really relaxed, just by this.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x586
STRING: [Chris] “Thanks. But, you're supposed to be my guest,
you know?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x5b8
STRING: [Torta] “Don't worry about that, just drink up.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x5ce
STRING: [Chris] “Okay.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x5e4
STRING: Torta made me a sweet caffé latte with a lot of milk in
it.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x5f0
STRING: [Chris] “Phew...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x606
STRING: The coffee permeated through my body, and I
unconsciously let out a big sigh.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x61c
STRING: When I made eye contact with Torta to see if she had
heard me sighing, she was just doing the exact same
thing as me after taking a sip from her own coffee.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x63c
STRING: Noticing my gaze, Torta gave me a warm smile.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x652
STRING: [Chris] “Sorry about all that just now... I didn't mean to
make you worry.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x68e
STRING: [Torta] “No, it's okay, it's my fault for being late.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x6a4
STRING: [Chris] “Anyway, I'm glad you're okay.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x6d6
STRING: [Torta] “Chris...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x700
STRING: Torta smiled gently, and then suddenly, sadness crept
onto her face.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x716
STRING: I didn't know why, and I was confused.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x722
STRING: [Chris] “What's wrong, Torta?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x740
STRING: [Torta] “We... Have to talk.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x756
STRING: [Chris] “Huh? Ahh, yeah, that's why we're meeting
tonight.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x788
STRING: [Torta] “No, you don't get it. We have to talk about
what's happened... And what's going to happen.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x7a8
STRING: [Chris] “Yeah, I know. We'll talk about that too. Torta?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x7da
STRING: [Torta] “We have to talk... About Arietta.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x7f0
STRING: [Chris] “That's true... We do have to talk about her. But,
there's one thing I want to say before that.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x810
STRING: [Chris] “I like you, Torta. You're the most important
person to me right now... Don't forget that.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x830
STRING: Those were the words I had planned to say to Torta,
right from the beginning.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x846
STRING: Regardless of what we ended up talking about, I
wanted to make sure she knew how I felt.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x85c
STRING: I thought Torta would be happy to hear me say that.
But, the expression that appeared on her face was the
exact opposite of what I had expected.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x898
STRING: [Torta] “Chris...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x8ae
STRING: [Chris] “T-Torta...? Why are you crying?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x8cc
STRING: [Torta] “Chris... There's something I have to tell you.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x8e2
STRING: [Chris] “Isn't that what you're doing now...?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x914
STRING: [Torta] “Listen!

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x942
STRING: Chris, think of your memories of Arie.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x94e
STRING: [Chris] “I... Don't want to think about those right now...
She broke up with me in her last letter. But, having said
that... I understand we can't avoid talking about
her.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x978
STRING: [Chris] “But you know, what's most important for us to
talk about is the future.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x9a0
STRING: [Torta] “The future... What I have to tell you about Arie,
connects to that.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x9c0
STRING: [Chris] “I agree that we won't be able to talk about the
future without talking about her too, but...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x9de
STRING: [Torta] “Chris...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x9f4
STRING: Torta spoke my name sharply, as if to stop me from
saying anything else.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa0a
STRING: I could see the resolve in her eyes.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa32
STRING: [Torta] “Chris. What I'm about to tell you, is terribly
cruel... And you may not want to believe it.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa5a
STRING: [Torta] “But, it's also the truth, and something you're
just going to have to accept.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa7a
STRING: [Chris] “...Torta? What are you talking about?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xaac
STRING: [Torta] “You have to believe me when I say this, I love
you from the bottom of my heart. I would do anything
for you, and I'll always be there for you.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xad6
STRING: [Chris] “Torta... Tortinita...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xaec
STRING: I said her name, as if to calm myself.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xaf8
STRING: I had the feeling that whatever Torta was planning to
tell me was not something trivial.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb0e
STRING: But even so, I had to listen to what she had to say.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb1a
STRING: The determination in Torta's eyes made me feel that
way.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb26
STRING: [Chris] “I'm not sure what you're talking about, but I'll
listen.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb62
STRING: [Torta] “Thank you.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb78
STRING: And then, before starting, Torta suddenly got up and
stood in front of me.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb96
STRING: [Torta] “Chris... I have feelings for you.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xbac
STRING: [Chris] “...I have feelings for you too.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xbde
STRING: It happened in an instant.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xbea
STRING: We drew close to each other, without even having time
to hesitate.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc0e
STRING: The two of us said nothing.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc1a
STRING: At least for the moment, words were not necessary.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc26
STRING: The warmth and softness of our lips met, and we stayed
like that, holding each other.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc44
STRING: [Torta] “Chris...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc5a
STRING: Our lips came apart for a moment and Torta repeated
my name, and then again we drew close.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc90
STRING: For a while it went on like this, the both of us unable to
pull away from each other.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xca6
STRING: It was going to be a long night.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xcb2
STRING: Just when I was thinking this, Torta pulled away and
looked me in the eyes.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xcc8
STRING: I was left with a sense of longing, and stroked Torta's
hair.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xcde
STRING: [Chris] “What's wrong, Torta...?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xcf4
STRING: For some reason, tears started to well up in Torta's
eyes.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd00
STRING: It was hard to think that they were tears of joy.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd28
STRING: [Torta] “Chris. We should talk now.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd3e
STRING: [Chris] “Yeah... I'm listening. It's about Arietta, right?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd54
STRING: I could think of only one reason why Torta would have
made such a face.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd6a
STRING: But I ignored the fear I felt, and said her name.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd7e
STRING: [Torta] “Yeah. What I want to talk about... Goes back
three years.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd94
STRING: Saying this, Torta undid the ribbon that tied back her
hair.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xdbe
STRING: Her hair fell, gently floating down to her shoulders.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xdca
STRING: She was looking at me, smiling.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xdd6
STRING: But... That face was...

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xde2
STRING: [Chris] “...Torta?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe00
STRING: [Torta] “You can't tell who I am...?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe16
STRING: [Chris] “I can, you're not Arie... You're not Arietta! But...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe36
STRING: They looked the same.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe42
STRING: No... Not the same.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe56
STRING: [Torta] “Who am I?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe6c
STRING: [Chris] “You're Tortinita... But, in that case, who did I
meet that time? Could it have been...?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe94
STRING: [Torta] “Could it have been?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xeaa
STRING: [Chris] “When I thought I was meeting Arie, I was just
meeting you?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xec0
STRING: If that was the truth... No, wait, what was going on
here?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xecc
STRING: I didn't understand.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xed8
STRING: But it was definitely Tortinita standing in front of me,
and I was sure this was the same girl I met two weeks
ago.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf00
STRING: [Torta] “Correct. I'm glad you didn't mistake me. I would
have felt sad if you thought it was Arie every time.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf20
STRING: [Chris] “Torta... What is going on? Why would you...?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf48
STRING: [Torta] “I'll tell you everything, so just listen. Where
Arietta is, and... How she's doing.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf68
STRING: [Chris] “What do you mean... Where? She's in... I, I got
letters from... Wait, the letters?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf90
STRING: [Torta] “I wrote all of them. Chris, listen carefully to
what I'm going to say. Arietta, she's...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xfb8
STRING: [Torta] “She's sleeping in a hospital bed, right at this
very moment.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xfce
STRING: [Chris] “She's been hospitalized...?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xfec
STRING: [Torta] “You saw it happen, Chris. Remember? Arie is
asleep, and she's not going to wake up.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1052
STRING: [Chris] “You're lying...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1070
STRING: [Torta] “It's the truth.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x10d4
STRING: [Chris] “What do you mean, she won't wake up? Isn't
she just sleeping? She looked like she was going to
wake up any second...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x10fc
STRING: [Torta] “She looks like she will wake up any second, but
she's still asleep... Do you remember now?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x111c
STRING: [Chris] “No! It can't be... No. She's probably just
sleeping, that's all.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x113c
STRING: The scene my mind created in front of me was vivid, so
vivid that Arie only seemed to just be sleeping.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x115a
STRING: [Torta] “You have to remember. That memory is real.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1170
STRING: [Chris] “...No.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x118e
STRING: [Torta] “Arie was in an accident, Chris... Right in front of
your eyes.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x11e2
STRING: [Torta] “Chris!”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x120e
STRING: My ears began to ring painfully loud, and I collapsed to
the floor.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1236
STRING: [Torta] “Are you okay?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x124c
STRING: Torta gently sat me up.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1258
STRING: [Chris] “But... Then, what about the letters?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1276
STRING: [Torta] “I told you, I was the one who wrote them.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x128c
STRING: [Chris] “But!”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x12a2
STRING: I stood up, and removed a number of letters from the
drawer of my desk.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x12b8
STRING: [Chris] “Are you saying that... All of these, are lies?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x12d6
STRING: [Torta] “Yes. I wrote them, all of them. Shall I tell you
what was in the most recent one?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x12fe
STRING: [Torta] “Please, listen to what Torta tells you.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x131c
STRING: [Torta] “And, if you truly have feelings for Torta, then
please believe in her.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1344
STRING: [Torta] “Even if this doesn't make sense to you right
now, the day will come when it will.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x136c
STRING: [Torta] “Until then, please do not forget my words.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1394
STRING: [Torta] “Did you forget?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x13aa
STRING: [Chris] “Of course not... But... Then, which is the truth,
and which are the lies?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x13ca
STRING: Torta took her ribbon, and tied back her hair once
again.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x13ec
STRING: And then, she smiled as she continued to speak.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1414
STRING: [Torta] “I'm so sorry. Almost everything was a lie. But,
this is the one thing you can believe. I'm Tortinita. And, I
love you.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1446
STRING: [Torta] “That's everything I needed to tell you.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x145c
STRING: And, as if to finish it off, she drew her face close to mine
once more.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1494
STRING: [Torta] “Do you love me?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x14aa
STRING: [Chris] “Yeah...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x14c0
STRING: Those feelings wouldn't change.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x14cc
STRING: No matter what.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x14e0
STRING: [Torta] “More than my sister?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x14f6
STRING: [Chris] “Yeah...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x150c
STRING: It wasn't a lie.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1518
STRING: I had felt that way... Before I had heard any of this.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x152c
STRING: [Torta] “Thank you. I'll always be here for you.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x155a
STRING: I held Torta close, and kissed her again.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1566
STRING: I didn't know if it was happiness or not, but I couldn't
help myself... I held Torta tightly.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x157c
STRING: Her body was warm, unlike that rainy night.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1588
STRING: I couldn't think about anything anymore...

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1594
STRING: We stayed in our embrace for a long time, listening to
the sound of the rain.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x15fc
STRING: [Torta] “Chris... Let's go, right now.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1612
STRING: [Chris] “Huh? To where?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1630
STRING: [Torta] “To our hometown.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1646
STRING: [Chris] “Not tomorrow... But, right now?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1664
STRING: [Torta] “That's right. Can we...? I really want us to go
there right now, no matter what. We're on vacation until
our graduation ceremony, anyway.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1684
STRING: [Chris] “No matter what...?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x16b6
STRING: [Torta] “That's right.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x16cc
STRING: I wondered if there was a reason for this.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x16d8
STRING: Torta spoke with strong conviction.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x16e4
STRING: All this stuff about Arietta just didn't feel real.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x16f0
STRING: I didn't think that Torta was lying now.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x16fc
STRING: So... In order to be sure, I might have needed to go
with Torta.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1712
STRING: [Chris] “Okay... What do I need to take with me?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1730
STRING: [Torta] “Just some clothes for a few days.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1746
STRING: [Chris] “I'll get packing.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1778
STRING: [Torta] “I'll give you a hand.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x178e
STRING: With the two of us working together, it only took about
five minutes.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x179a
STRING: I busily went about checking this and that.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x17a6
STRING: [Chris] “Do you know the times the overnight trains
leave, stuff like that?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x17d8
STRING: [Torta] “Yeah. I've looked it up before... When I needed
to lie to you. I'm pretty sure there is a train that leaves
at about 11PM on Friday nights.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1802
STRING: When she said that Arie came to visit by overnight train,
that was a lie too...

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1818
STRING: I didn't have time to get caught up thinking about these
things.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x182e
STRING: I still hadn't come to terms with all of my emotions just
yet, but I felt that as long as I could keep busy, I would
stay on top of things.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x184e
STRING: [Chris] “We've got thirty more minutes. What about
your things, Torta?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1864
STRING: We just finished my packing.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1870
STRING: Which was actually just stuffing a couple of days' worth
of clothes into my bag.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1898
STRING: [Torta] “If you help me, it shouldn't take long. The only
other thing to think about is if there are any empty
seats, but I think that should be okay.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x18c2
STRING: [Chris] “I'd assume there won't be that many people on
the train...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x18f4
STRING: [Torta] “Okay. Let's go!”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x190a
STRING: Torta stood in my doorway, prompting me to get
moving.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1916
STRING: Phorni said she wasn't going to come out today, but...

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x192c
STRING: I thought that we should have at least spoken a little.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1938
STRING: But, I couldn't just call her name in front of Torta.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1944
STRING: [Chris] “I'm heading out!”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x196e
STRING: I said this is a slightly loud voice.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x197a
STRING: Torta gave me a puzzled look, but I wasn't able explain
anything.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x19e6
STRING: [Torta] “Grandma, I'm home!”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1a18
STRING: [Ninna] “Hmm? Torta... You're home early. And judging
from that voice...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1a4c
STRING: [Chris] “Good evening, Ninna.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1a7e
STRING: [Ninna] “Hmm? Is that you, Chris?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1ab0
STRING: [Torta] “We don't have much time to talk. I have to pack
my bags, sorry.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1ad8
STRING: [Ninna] “Are you planning to go somewhere?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1b0a
STRING: [Torta] “We're going back to our hometown, to see
Arie.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1b2a
STRING: Torta cast her eyes down and responded in a
determined tone.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1b3e
STRING: [Ninna] “Chris... You've been told everything?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1b54
STRING: [Chris] “Yes... But, it still hasn't sunk in yet. However, I
know that we have to go and see her. It's just a matter
of sooner or later.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1b9a
STRING: [Ninna] “I See. Okay... You have my blessing. Do you
need to pack?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1bb0
STRING: Torta responded to Ninna's question hastily.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1bd8
STRING: [Torta] “Yeah, I have to go upstairs and do it now.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1bee
STRING: [Chris] “I'm going to help, too.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1c0c
STRING: [Ninna] “Okay... Be quick.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1c5a
STRING: We came downstairs again, and prepared to go running
out the door.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1c82
STRING: [Ninna] “Wait a moment.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1c98
STRING: Ninna called out to us from the kitchen.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1cca
STRING: [Torta] “Oh, I'm sorry. You weren't in the living room so I
thought you might have gone to bed.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1d06
STRING: [Ninna] “I was just making these. Here you are.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1d30
STRING: Saying this, Ninna gave us a paper bag which had some
sandwiches inside.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1d46
STRING: It looked like a little bit much for two people.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1d52
STRING: How did she make all this in such a short time...?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1d66
STRING: [Ninna] “They don't look like much, but that won't stop
them from tasting good.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1d98
STRING: [Torta] “Thank you.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1db6
STRING: [Ninna] “Also, there's some money in the bag for you to
buy your tickets with.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1df2
STRING: [Torta] “Grandma...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1e08
STRING: [Chris] “I brought my own money, so...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1e26
STRING: [Ninna] “Do you have enough for the trip back? Come
on now, you're in a hurry, aren't you? Come back here
when you return, and we can talk about it then.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1e50
STRING: It was true, I hadn't really thought about the trip back.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1e64
STRING: [Ninna] “Now, go and pay Arietta a visit.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1e96
STRING: [Torta] “Okay...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1eac
STRING: [Chris] “Yes...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1f08
STRING: The train sped along the tracks towards our hometown.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1f14
STRING: We just sat there staring out the windows, passing the
time.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1f20
STRING: The overnight train we were on was divided into two
carriages. One that only had seats, which we were in,
and one for sleeping.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1f36
STRING: I didn't feel like I was going to be able to sleep at all,
so I just sat where I was, gazing out the window.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1f4c
STRING: While we were on the move I didn't feel it so much, but
now that we were sitting down just waiting for time to
pass, I couldn't help but think about Arie.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1f6c
STRING: [Chris] “You don't need to sleep, Torta...?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1f9e
STRING: [Torta] “Well, you said you weren't going to sleep, so
I'm not either.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1fb4
STRING: [Chris] “Yeah... There's some things I wanted to think
about.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1fe6
STRING: [Torta] “Should I give you some time to yourself?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1ffc
STRING: [Chris] “Ah, no... That's not what I meant.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x202e
STRING: [Torta] “In that case, I'll stay here... If you don't want to
talk, I'll just be quiet.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x204e
STRING: [Chris] “I don't mind you staying, but if you want to talk,
then that's okay too.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x208a
STRING: [Torta] “Oh... Thanks.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x20a0
STRING: Saying this, Torta shifted her gaze to the window, just
like I did.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x20c4
STRING: The sound of the rain on the window, and the dull
sound of the train running on its rails was in an infinite
loop.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x20da
STRING: [Chris] “Torta... Can I ask you one thing? How... Can
you still keep a face like that?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x20fa
STRING: I suppose “cheerful” would have been the right word for
her expression.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2106
STRING: While I wasn't completely incapable, I still found it hard
to keep a pleasant face.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2138
STRING: [Torta] “I can do it because I have you beside me. But,
I'm beside you too, so that you can keep smiling.
Everything will be okay.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2158
STRING: [Chris] “...I still can't remember.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x218a
STRING: [Torta] “You'll remember eventually, little by little.
Everything might come back to you when see Arie
tomorrow.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x21aa
STRING: [Chris] “Yeah... But, is Arie really...?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x21dc
STRING: [Torta] “Yes.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x21f2
STRING: Torta's response was brief.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x21fe
STRING: I was... I was still in disbelief.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x220a
STRING: But the image of Arie laying in bed that popped into my
mind earlier was still seared into my thoughts.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2220
STRING: How had I forgotten about this?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x222c
STRING: About something as important as this?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2254
STRING: [Torta] “Chris, look at me.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x226a
STRING: [Chris] “Yeah... Okay.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2288
STRING: [Torta] “Let's just go and see her. In order to decide our
future. If, by any chance you decide that you want to
take a different path to me in life after seeing
her... I won't stop you.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x22b2
STRING: [Chris] “Don't be ridiculous. I won't say that...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x22e4
STRING: [Torta] “Thanks. Don't forget what I say, okay? And, it's
okay for you to forget what you just said to me.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2304
STRING: [Chris] “Why do you say these things?! I... I wouldn't...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2340
STRING: [Torta] “I'm sorry. It's just, you looked like you were
hurt, so...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2356
STRING: [Chris] “Torta... Why are you going to these lengths for
me?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2388
STRING: [Torta] “Because I love you, Chris.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x239e
STRING: [Chris] “But writing those letters must have been hard
on you...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x23c6
STRING: [Torta] “Even so, if I can be here with you like this, then
I can say that it wasn't hard on me at all, because I've
always had these feelings for you.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x23f0
STRING: [Chris] “Torta...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x240e
STRING: [Torta] “Let's return to our hometown. And then, let's go
and see her. For us, and our future.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x242e
STRING: Torta took my hand, and gave me a smile that was
all-forgiving.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2480
STRING: [Chris] “Ngh...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x24b2
STRING: [Torta] “What's the matter?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x24c8
STRING: I reflexively covered my ear with my hand.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x24d4
STRING: I suppose the sensation in my eardrum felt was as if it
were being crushed.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x24e0
STRING: It probably happened at the same time that we entered
the tunnel.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x24f4
STRING: [Torta] “Does your ear hurt...?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x250a
STRING: [Chris] “No, it doesn't hurt... It just felt kind of weird.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2532
STRING: [Torta] “I thought that your ears had completely healed.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2548
STRING: [Chris] “Healed? Did I... Hurt my ears or something?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x257a
STRING: [Torta] “You don't remember that either, I see. I guess I'll
have to start from there. It was three years ago... Before
we came here for school, Arie was involved in an
accident.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x25c0
STRING: [Torta] “You were there, Chris... So actually, you're
supposed to know more than I do, but...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x25e0
STRING: [Chris] “Sorry... I don't remember a thing.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x25fe
STRING: [Torta] “That's why I'm going to tell you, about Arie, and
about me.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2640
STRING: Saying this, Torta told me everything, piece by piece.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x264e
STRING: It wasn't particularly different from what she had told
me earlier.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x265a
STRING: But, how I got to be where I am now.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2666
STRING: The reason why Arie's letters always came a week late.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2672
STRING: How those letters ended up reaching me.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x267e
STRING: Torta explained all of these things to me, as if she was
just telling me a story.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2696
STRING: I could tell that Torta wasn't completely over everything
that had happened, as I noticed that a stressed look
crept onto her face every time she mentioned her sister.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x26da
STRING: Torta sighed heavily after telling such a long story, and
closed her eyes.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x26f0
STRING: Come to think of it, we had only just finished our
graduation recital today.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x26fc
STRING: It was no surprise that she was tired.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2708
STRING: I was also quite tired, but I couldn't seem to find my
composure, and was unable to move from where I sat.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x273a
STRING: [Torta] “I'm sorry... I guess I must be tired.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2750
STRING: [Chris] “In that case... Why don't you go get some
sleep? I'll be here for a while.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2782
STRING: [Torta] “No, I'll stay here. Wake me up if I fall asleep,
okay?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2798
STRING: [Chris] “Nope, not going to do that. I'll just sit here and
enjoy watching you sleep.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x27ca
STRING: [Torta] “Don't be silly...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x27e0
STRING: Torta was still holding my hand.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x27ec
STRING: Perhaps the air-conditioning was too strong, as I felt a
bit hot.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x27f8
STRING: I could feel a light sweat where the skin of our hands
met.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2804
STRING: But, this warmth may have been the thing I needed
most right now.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2836
STRING: [Torta] “The train will arrive at about ten o'clock in the
morning, right?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x284c
STRING: [Chris] “Hmm? Uh... Yeah, seems that way.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2862
STRING: I responded, reading what was printed on the ticket.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x286e
STRING: There was also a number written on the ticket of the
room in the sleeping carriage we could use, but I wasn't
sure if we were going to use it or not.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x288c
STRING: [Torta] “The hospital visiting hours are from about that
time, too, so it should work out well.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x28ac
STRING: [Chris] “How do we get there from the station?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x28ca
STRING: [Torta] “We should probably go by car. I checked the
paper bag that Grandma gave us; it seems she put a lot
of money in there.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x28ea
STRING: [Chris] “I think we should try our best not to use that
money, though...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2926
STRING: [Torta] “But, I think it'll be better than us going with
your father, or mine... I think the two of us... No, the
three of us, should meet alone first.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2950
STRING: [Chris] “Right... I guess we can always pay her back
when we return.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x298c
STRING: [Torta] “Yeah. I think Grandma would be really happy if
we returned as musicians.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x29ac
STRING: [Chris] “True... That's one option that's open to us.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x29ca
STRING: [Torta] “Uh-huh.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x29e0
STRING: We talked about these kind of things that awaited us in
the future.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x29ec
STRING: But, I had a feeling that if I went back to our hometown,
I would never return to Piova.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2a02
STRING: Arie was unconscious, and I couldn't leave her like that
again.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2a0e
STRING: Torta probably felt the same way.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2a1a
STRING: This was innocent talk of dream-like things.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2a5c
STRING: Suddenly-

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2a68
STRING: The muffled sound disappeared, and it now felt lighter
inside the train.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2a7e
STRING: It wasn't as if it had become dramatically brighter or
anything.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2a94
STRING: But, the other side of the window that I had been
staring at the whole trip, suddenly started to glitter.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2aaa
STRING: [Chris] “Stars.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2ac8
STRING: [Torta] “Huh?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2ade
STRING: I sensed without looking that Torta had suddenly
opened her eyes, and was now looking out the window
too.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2af4
STRING: [Chris] “We can see the stars... I guess it's not raining
over here.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2b12
STRING: [Torta] “Chris...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2b28
STRING: Torta's hand gripped mine tighter.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2b3c
STRING: [Torta] “Oh... It's finally stopped raining for you.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2b72
STRING: [Chris] “Huh?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2ba4
STRING: [Torta] “It's not going to rain anymore... Even if you go
back to Piova.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2bba
STRING: [Chris] “What do you mean...?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2bec
STRING: [Torta] “I'm so glad it's stopped.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2c02
STRING: Torta suddenly started to cry.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2c16
STRING: [Torta] “It never rained. Not once.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2c2c
STRING: [Chris] “...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2c4a
STRING: [Torta] “I just got so used to how you thought it was
raining, that I forget to say it. But, that doesn't matter
any more.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2c6a
STRING: [Chris] “I was... Seeing an illusion?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2c9c
STRING: [Torta] “You were always crying, like a child that got
soaked in the rain. It was as if you blamed yourself.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2cbc
STRING: [Chris] “How could that be...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2cee
STRING: [Torta] “But, now we can both see the same sky, can't
we? A sky with no clouds... And no rain.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2d0e
STRING: I was at a loss for words.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2d1a
STRING: I couldn't believe that the rain was just... An illusion I
had created.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2d26
STRING: But, Torta didn't appear to be lying about this.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2d40
STRING: I thought about asking her about it one more time, but
she must have really been tired, as she had already
fallen asleep, with her head resting on my shoulder.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2d60
STRING: [Chris] “Torta...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2d76
STRING: I guess it didn't matter anymore.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2d82
STRING: I could feel the warmth from her leaning on my
shoulder.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2d8e
STRING: I noticed it when we held each other earlier, but her
body was delicately slim.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2d9a
STRING: For three years, she had endured all kinds of pain for
me...

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2db0
STRING: I started to hate myself when I thought about this.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2dbc
STRING: But... What was there that I could do for her?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2dc8
STRING: The best thing I could do was to stay by her side.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2dd4
STRING: Torta said something about me just before, but I
actually thought the same thing about her, too.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2dea
STRING: She was like a child that was crying, and I wasn't going
to leave her side.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2df6
STRING: I wasn't going to make her go through any more pain
because of me.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2e02
STRING: I made a promise to myself, deep inside my heart.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2e88
STRING: And suddenly, I was awake again.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2e94
STRING: I too had fallen asleep at some point, and now it was no
longer dark.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2eaa
STRING: There wasn't a cloud in the winter sky.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2eb6
STRING: The train must have covered a lot of distance, as the
scenery outside was now quite different.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2ecc
STRING: Everything was covered in a layer of snow, and the
winter landscape was nostalgic to me.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2ed8
STRING: Bringing my face just a little closer to the window
caused it to fog up.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2ee4
STRING: Rubbing it clear with my hand, I gazed out the window
once more.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2f0c
STRING: [Torta] “Mmm... It's morning?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2f22
STRING: [Chris] “Torta... Good morning.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2f54
STRING: [Torta] “Oh,

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2f82
STRING: good morning.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2f8e
STRING: Once I started to move my body about, I noticed that I
ached all over.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2f9a
STRING: Probably because of the fact we slept in our seats.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2fa6
STRING: [Chris] “You're not sore?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2fc4
STRING: [Torta] “No, I'm okay. I... Borrowed your shoulder all
night, didn't I? Are you alright?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2fe4
STRING: [Chris] “Yeah, no problems.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3016
STRING: [Torta] “What time is it?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x302c
STRING: Checking the clock inside the train, I found that it was
just after seven o'clock in the morning.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3042
STRING: [Chris] “You can still sleep for another two hours; why
don't you get some more sleep?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3074
STRING: [Torta] “No, I'm okay. Why don't we eat those
sandwiches? That is, if you're not still sleepy.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3094
STRING: [Chris] “I'm good, I only slept a short time but I got a
good sleep, no dreams.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x30c6
STRING: [Torta] “Oh, that's good to hear.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x30dc
STRING: Torta opened up the paper bag and got out the
sandwiches that Ninna made for us yesterday.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x30f2
STRING: And then, as if she'd just remembered, she went off to
the sleeping carriage, and came back with two paper
cups filled with hot tea.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x312e
STRING: [Torta] “Here you are.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3144
STRING: [Chris] “Thanks.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x315a
STRING: We drank the tea and ate a lot of sandwiches.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3166
STRING: I felt like it warmed me all the way through to my heart.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3172
STRING: Enjoying it while it lasted, we sat quietly on the train,
waiting for it to arrive at our destination, and the reason
we were coming here.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3188
STRING: It was going to be soon.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x31ba
STRING: The hospital had already begun its visiting hours, so we
were able to enter at our own convenience.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x31d0
STRING: Skipping the troublesome paperwork, we hurried our
way up the stairs.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x31dc
STRING: Torta said Arie should be in the same room as before,
as they hadn't received any notifications of her being
moved.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x322e
STRING: [Torta] “Arie...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3244
STRING: Torta spoke her sister's name quietly as she entered the
room.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3250
STRING: I went in right behind her.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3278
STRING: [Torta] “...Huh?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x328e
STRING: Torta looked around the room as if she were surprised,
and when I did the same I realized the reason for her
reaction.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x32a4
STRING: There was nobody here.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x32b0
STRING: The only thing in the room was a bed, with a perfectly
spread sheet on it.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x32c6
STRING: Torta stepped out of the room, and came back in after
checking the name plate outside.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x32e4
STRING: [Torta] “Her name... It isn't written on the plate.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x32fa
STRING: [Chris] “Did we come to the wrong room?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x332c
STRING: [Torta] “This is room 212... There's no mistake.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3342
STRING: [Chris] “But...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3374
STRING: [Torta] “This isn't right... Arie? Where are you?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x338a
STRING: [Chris] “Perhaps they moved her?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x33bc
STRING: [Torta] “She's supposed to be right here!”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x33d2
STRING: [Chris] “Torta!”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x33e8
STRING: Torta suddenly shouted at me, as if she was angry.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x33f4
STRING: I embraced her, in an effort to quiet her.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3400
STRING: I suppose it was because I had no memories... But I was
able to remain more composed than Torta.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3416
STRING: I felt a sense of loathing at myself for forgetting Arie,
but this wasn't the time for the two of us to be losing
control of our emotions.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3452
STRING: [???] “What are you doing here?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x347c
STRING: [Chris] “Oh... I'm very sorry.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3492
STRING: The nurse probably heard our voices, and came to see
what was going on.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x34a8
STRING: She glared at us with a look of suspicion in her eyes.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x34c8
STRING: [Chris] “I think we may have come to the wrong room.
We wanted to visit the girl who was previously in this
room...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x34f0
STRING: [Nurse] “Hmm? You're...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3506
STRING: The nurse looked at Torta, and suddenly the expression
on her face changed.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x351a
STRING: [Nurse] “You're Arietta's sister.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x354c
STRING: [Torta] “Huh? Oh... Yes. I'm surprised you realized. But...
Has she been moved to a different room?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x356c
STRING: Torta didn't seem to remember the nurse, as she
seemed a little surprised before responding.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3582
STRING: However, I didn't miss the expression that appeared on
the nurse's face the moment Torta asked about Arie.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3598
STRING: My condolences...

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x35a4
STRING: If the nurse had put it into words, I'm sure that's what
she would have said.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x35b0
STRING: I understood what had happened.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x35c4
STRING: [Nurse] “Of course I realized, you two look exactly the
same. Did you hear?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x35e2
STRING: [Torta] “I'm sorry? Hear what?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3600
STRING: [Nurse] “Your father said he was going to pick you up
yesterday, so I assumed...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x361e
STRING: [Torta] “He did?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x363c
STRING: [Nurse] “Yes. This young man over here must be Chris,
yes? I remember you too.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3678
STRING: [Torta] “I'm sorry but, what are you talking about? Why
was my father going to pick us up?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x36a0
STRING: [Nurse] “Could it be that... You haven't heard? At nine
o'clock yesterday morning, your sister, Arietta...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x36c0
STRING: No... I didn't want to hear it.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x36d4
STRING: [Nurse] “She passed away.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x36ea
STRING: [Torta] “...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3700
STRING: [Chris] “Did she really...?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x371e
STRING: [Nurse] “This is not something I could lie about.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3734
STRING: [Chris] “I see...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3752
STRING: [Torta] “...No, you're lying.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3770
STRING: [Nurse] “She passed peacefully in the morning...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3786
STRING: [Torta] “...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x37a4
STRING: [Nurse] “Tortinita, wasn't it? Listen carefully to me.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x37c2
STRING: [Nurse] “Really, I think you should be hearing this from
your parents, but it seems that you've managed to miss
each other, so I will tell you instead.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x37ec
STRING: [Torta] “...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3802
STRING: [Chris] “Torta.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3826
STRING: Torta remained quiet, looking at the ground, and didn't
respond when I spoke to her.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x383c
STRING: I took her hand and gave her support.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3848
STRING: The truth was, she had been supporting me too.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3854
STRING: If I had let go of her hand, I wasn't sure if I could
remain standing on my own.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3872
STRING: [Nurse] “I'm truly sorry. There was nothing we could do
for her. There are no patients scheduled to use this
room, so you can stay here for a while if you need
to.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x38a4
STRING: [Nurse] “I will let the head nurse know what is going on.
Once you feel you are ready, you should go home to
your family.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x38c4
STRING: She stared at us with a look of concern, and then left
the room, most likely to return to her work.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x38da
STRING: We were left in the cold and empty hospital room,
leaning on each other for support.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3920
STRING: Apparently Arietta did not regain consciousness even
once during the past three years.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3936
STRING: The doctor that took care of her said that she probably
felt no pain either.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x394e
STRING: I wasn't sure what kind of consolation that was
supposed to be, but the doctor said this, trying to
comfort us.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3988
STRING: After that, Torta didn't once try to raise her head.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3994
STRING: We sat down on the bed, and passed the time in
silence.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x39a0
STRING: I had a feeling that continuing to do this wasn't going to
be any good for Torta, so I decided to speak up.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x39b6
STRING: [Chris] “Torta...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x39cc
STRING: [Torta] “...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x39e2
STRING: [Chris] “Torta... are you crying?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x39f8
STRING: Her shoulders were not quivering.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3a04
STRING: And I could not hear her sobbing.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3a10
STRING: But for some reason, I thought she may have been
crying.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3a24
STRING: [Torta] “Chris...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3a3a
STRING: Torta finally raised her head, and looked at me.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3a46
STRING: There was not a single trace of tears in her eyes.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3a6e
STRING: [Torta] “Chris, you know, I...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3a84
STRING: Torta started to speak, bit by bit.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3a98
STRING: [Torta] “I don't feel so sad, for some reason.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3aae
STRING: [Chris] “...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3acc
STRING: [Torta] “Of course, I don't mean to say I'm happy or
anything, because of what's going on with us.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3af4
STRING: [Torta] “But I just feel... relieved.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3b0a
STRING: Saying this, Torta pushed down on the bed a few times,
as if to feel the texture of it.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3b20
STRING: The bed creaked in response, making an unpleasant
noise.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3b34
STRING: [Torta] “Arie, she... She slept here for almost three
years. On this hard bed. She didn't even move...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3b66
STRING: [Torta] “They say that three years in that condition is a
long time. My father wrote in his letters that she got
thinner and thinner during that time.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3b98
STRING: [Torta] “I received a lot of letters this year saying that
she wasn't doing well. The doctors had also said that if
she stayed in that state for too long, it would be
dangerous.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3bc2
STRING: Torta let out a big sigh, and then continued.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3bd6
STRING: [Torta] “That's why, I feel relieved. Just... Relieved.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3bec
STRING: [Chris] “Torta... I'm sorry I couldn't do anything to help
you, for all this time.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3c28
STRING: [Torta] “Am I a terrible human being? I wonder why I
can't cry. I feel sad, but...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3c48
STRING: [Chris] “Torta...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3c6c
STRING: I said nothing more, and just embraced her tightly.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3c78
STRING: In my arms, Torta was still murmuring her thoughts.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3c96
STRING: [Torta] “I used to cry so much before we came here.
The littlest things made me sad, and I cried so many
tears.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3cb6
STRING: [Chris] “Torta... It's okay now.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3cd4
STRING: [Torta] “I wonder if Arie will forgive me?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3cea
STRING: [Chris] “Knowing Arie... I'm sure she will.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3d08
STRING: [Torta] “Arie...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3d1e
STRING: Torta murmured one last word, and then cried her eyes
out.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3dba
STRING: Heavenly Father, grant these souls eternal rest...

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3de0
STRING: The priest began to recite the first lines of the prayer
used in the Mass for those who have died.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3df6
STRING: The coffin in which Arie lay soon became buried under
the layers of dirt.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3e02
STRING: Torta and I didn't notice the passage of time as we
stood there, hand in hand, praying as we watched
everything unfold.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3e18
STRING: We watched our families and the father leave, and soon
it was just the two of us that remained.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3e2e
STRING: Such breaches in etiquette were forgiven in this country.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3e3a
STRING: We gave our thanks to everything done for us, and then
started to get ready.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3e5e
STRING: I set up my Fortelle on the ground, and positioned
myself to face Torta.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3e74
STRING: Torta's hair fluttered in the strong wind.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3e88
STRING: [Torta] “The weather is good today.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3e9e
STRING: [Chris] “Yeah. A little windy, though.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3ebc
STRING: [Torta] “What are we going to do now?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3ed2
STRING: [Chris] “There's only thing we can do. We're going to
play a requiem for Arie. So that she can rest peacefully.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3efa
STRING: [Torta] “No... I meant in the future.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3f10
STRING: [Chris] “We'll think about that in future, but for now...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3f2e
STRING: [Torta] “Hehe, you're right. Shall we play for her, then?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3f44
STRING: Torta smiled, and took a deep breath.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3f58
STRING: [Torta] “Are you ready?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3f6e
STRING: Torta was calm as she asked me this.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3f7a
STRING: [Chris] “Yeah.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3f90
STRING: There wasn't really much need for any more words than
this.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3f9c
STRING: I began to the play the first note on my Fortelle, and
Torta let herself be taken by it, closing her eyes.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3fd2
STRING: We continued playing our requiem for Arie.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3fde
STRING: Torta sang, and I played my Fortelle.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3fea
STRING: Neither of us spoke any words.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3ff6
STRING: But, our song... Our song is what spoke.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4002
STRING: Our music spoke our feelings for us, eloquently as if
each note were a word itself.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x400e
STRING: Words for the dead, and words for us, who were left
behind in this mortal world.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4024
STRING: Through our music, we also spoke to each other.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4030
STRING: Torta simply sang.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x403c
STRING: And I simply kept playing my Fortelle.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4048
STRING: So that we could carry on tomorrow.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4054
STRING: So that we could keep smiling tomorrow.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4060
STRING: Our requiem seemed to continue endlessly, rising up
into the beautiful winter sky.
